history.content:
If you believe there is an error, you could submit a ticket by emailing sishelp@berkeley.edu. Make sure to include your SID#. As of late last week, it looked like nobody's GPA was up to date- it's possible things have not been fully updated yet.

EDIT: I see this message at the top of Cal Central: Views of student records (Cumulative Units & Summer enrollments) in Cal Central may be incomplete due to data migration issues. GPA is now updated.

If you believe there is an error, you could submit a ticket by emailing sishelp@berkeley.edu. Make sure to include your SID#. As of late last week, it looked like nobody's GPA was up to date- it's possible things have not been fully updated yet.

My GPA on CalCentral was just updated to include Fall 2016 classes, but I think it was done incorrectly. My cumulative GPA is lower than I expected it to be. I did the calculation myself and the GPA I found was actually higher than the one reported on CalCentral.

Is anyone else having this issue? Who can I ask about this?
history.subject: CalCentral GPA Incorrect
